title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Foreign Affairs and the Department of Defence) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department foreign affair department defence) order 2023

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Laura Mannion, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Laura Mannion, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Peter Burke, Minister of State at the Department of Foreign Affairs, with 
effect from 21 December 2022.
text_norm: 2 laura mannion particular whose address deposited office department foreign affair appointed special adviser peter burke minister state department foreign affair effect 21 december 2022

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 3. Laura Mannion, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Laura Mannion, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Defence, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Peter Burke, Minister of State at the Department of Defence, with effect from 21 
December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

8 June, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [312] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
